title: Bad Echo sprite sheet JSON schema
description: Defines the layout of a sprite sheet's grid and provides context for individual frames.

texturePath.description: The path to the file containing the texture of the individual animation frames that compose the sprite sheet.

rowCount.description: The number of rows of frames in the sprite sheet.

columnCount.description: The number of columns of frames in the sprite sheet.

rowUp.description: The index of the row for upward movement.

rowDown.description: The index of the row for downward movement.

rowLeft.description: The index of the row for leftward movement.

rowRight.description: The index of the row for rightward movement.

rowInitial.description: The index of the row containing initially drawn frames, prior to any movement occurring.
